channel.title: [req] fish sticks banner
channel.description:
I need a banner for my server, which consists of a large fish stick in the background and any font and size letters would be nice; just make sure it says "Fiddle my Fishstick" in the middle. The background can be any color, it does not matter and it must not be bigger than 750x750.
optional: You can make the fish stick in the background look like it's fighting a sword to give the banner more action. You can add multiple fish sticks in the background to express how fattening my server is. You can add a quote or such of your choice, any would be good, sort of like [code]we put the sticks in RSPS. let us fat you with our juicy server. hungry? play our server![/code]
[right]thanks[/right]

item.title: [req] fish sticks banner
item.dc:creator: @xknightpk xknightpk

I need a banner for my server, which consists of a large fish stick in the background and any font and size letters would be nice; just make sure it says “Fiddle my Fishstick” in the middle. The background can be any color, it does not matter and it must not be bigger than 750x750.
